byline.original: By JENNA WORTHAM and TARA PARKER-POPE

abstract: Rounding up the outpouring of tributes mourning the passing of Steve Jobs, from Web comics to heartfelt recollections.
snippet: Rounding up the outpouring of tributes mourning the passing of Steve Jobs, from Web comics to heartfelt recollections.

headline.main: Around the Web, Memories of Steve Jobs
